owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.recovery: The recovery address for this AID
The recovery address for this AID
params.to: The address that will own the AID

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

aidOf(address).notice: Mapping of custody address to AID

cancelRecovery().notice: Cancel a pending recovery (called by current custody)

changeRecovery(address).notice: Change the recovery address for your AID

completeRecovery(uint256).notice: Complete a recovery after the escrow period

custodyOf(uint256).notice: Mapping of AID to custody address

hasId(address).notice: Check if an address has an AID

recoveryOf(uint256).notice: Mapping of AID to recovery address

recoveryStatus(uint256).notice: Get recovery status for an AID

register(address).notice: Register a new AID for the caller

registerFor(address,address).notice: Register a new AID for another address (sponsored registration)

requestRecovery(uint256,address).notice: Initiate recovery of an AID (called by recovery address)

transfer(address).notice: Transfer AID to a new custody address
